name: Don't Step On White Candy Tile
name_original: Don't Step On White Candy Tile
description:
********** Free Candy Tile Game! ************

******** Addicting Tile Stepping Fun **********

Craving for some sweet tile-stepping action? Stop yourself from drooling from this awesome candy tile game that is sure to get you hooked.

Test your reflexes against time and movement. Tap on the white tile and the game is over. Keep stepping on the pink candy tiles to get the farthest at the fastest amount of time.

This is a difficult game yet fun an amazingly addictive. Your speed and accuracy is what it takes to win!

Can you beat your own score?

Features:

* Simplistic user interface
* Cute and colorful graphics
* Play with your friends
* Multiple difficulty levels
* Fun for all ages

Flex those fingers and get your game on!

Download FREE Today!
